Umineko Project (UP): I became the Halloween party princess, and the tournament of quizzes and riddles just for me began.
Steam (ST): I became the Halloween party princess, and the tournament of quizzes and riddles just for me began.
PC Japanese (JP): 私はハロウィンパーティーのお姫様になり、私のためだけのクイズとなぞなぞ大会が開かれることになった。
Russian (RU): Я стала принцессой хэллоуинской вечеринки, и специально для меня начали турнир викторин и загадок.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu me tornei a princesa da Festa de Halloween, e um torneio de quizzes e enigmas feito só para mim, começou.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我成為萬聖夜派對的公主，為了我而進行問答猜謎大會。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我成为万圣夜派对的公主，为了我而进行问答猜谜大会。

Steam (ST): It looks like I get a medal for each puzzle I get right.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It looks like I get a medal for each puzzle I get right.

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 猜對了，就會拿到金幣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 猜对了，就会拿到金币。

Umineko Project (UP): If I get a lot, I'm supposed to get a wonderful prize from Grandfather.
Steam (ST): If I get a lot, I'm supposed to get a wonderful prize from Grandfather.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I get a lot, I'm supposed to get a wonderful prize from Grandfather.

Russian (RU): Если соберу много таких, дедушка даст мне чудесный приз.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se conseguir várias, eu devo ganhar um prêmio incrível do vovô.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 拿到好多的话，爷爷就会给我很棒的奖励。

Steam (ST): Okay, here I go.

Steam (ST): "Who should I start with?"

Steam (ST): "Then let us begin, Ange. This is a story about December 25th, Christmas Day."

Umineko Project (UP): Even though it was October, he suddenly started talking about Christmas.{n}Is he going to ask what day Christmas is?
Steam (ST): Even though it was October, he suddenly started talking about Christmas. Is he going to ask what day Christmas is?

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): まだ１０月だというのに、唐突にクリスマスの話をされる。{n}クリスマスは何日かという問題だろうか？

Steam (ST): I know that. It's December 25th.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "On Christmas Day, a woman looked up at the night sky and said, "Eventually, the night will end, and morning will come. Wouldn't it be wonderful if, after the sun sinks and it becomes night once more, it could be Christmas again?" Then, the man beside her said, "Okay, I'll make your dream come true for you." Is such a thing possible...?"
Steam (ST): "On Christmas Day, a woman looked up at the night sky and spoke: "Eventually, the night will end, and morning will come. Wouldn't it be wonderful if, after the sun sinks and it becomes night once more, it could be Christmas again?" And then, the man spoke. "Okay, I'll make your dream come true for you." Is such a thing possible...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "On Christmas Day, a woman looked up at the night sky and spoke. 『Eventually, the night will end, and morning will come. Wouldn't it be wonderful if, after the sun sinks and it becomes night once more, it could be Christmas again?』 And then, the man spoke. 『Okay, I'll make your dream come true for you.』 Is such a thing possible...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「クリスマスの日。夜空を見上げながら、女は言った。『やがて夜が明けて朝になるわね。そしてまた日が沈んで夜になっても、またクリスマスだったらいいのに』。すると男は言った。『いいよ。その夢を叶えてあげるよ』と。そんなことが、果たして可能だろうか…？」
Russian (RU): "В Рождество женщина посмотрела на ночное небо и сказала "В конце концов ночь закончится и наступит утро. Разве не было бы прекрасно, если бы после захода солнца и наступления ночи Рождество могло бы настать снова?" И тогда мужчина ответил "Ладно, ради тебя я исполню твою мечту". Такое возможно?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Dia de Natal. Enquanto olhava para o céu noturno, uma mulher disse: "Eventualmente a noite chegará ao fim e a manhã virá. Não seria maravilhoso se, depois que o Sol se pôr e voltasse a ser noite mais uma vez, pudesse ser Natal de novo?" Então, o homem que estava ao seu lado disse: "Muito bem, eu irei realizar seu sonho." Tal coisa é mesmo possível...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「聖誕節那天。抬頭看著夜空，女人說道。『很快夜晚就要過去迎來早晨了呢。要是太陽再次落下進入夜晚的時候，還是聖誕節該有多好』。男人這樣回答。『好啊。我就滿足你這個願望』。這種事，可能會發生嗎…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「圣诞节那天。抬头看着夜空，女人说道。『很快夜晚就要过去迎来早晨了呢。要是太阳再次落下进入夜晚的时候，还是圣诞节该有多好』。男人这样回答。『好啊。我就满足你这个愿望』。这种事，可能会发生吗…？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "The day after Christmas is the 26th, a normal day. That's impossible."
Steam (ST): "The day after Christmas is the 26th, a normal day. That's impossible."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「クリスマスの次の日は２６日で普通の日だもん。そんなの無理」
Russian (RU): "За Рождеством следует 26‐е — обычный день. Невозможно."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "O dia depois do natal é dia 26, um dia normal. Isso é impossível."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「聖誕節的第二天就是 26 日，是普通的日子了。那時是不可能的。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「圣诞节的第二天就是 26 日，是普通的日子了。那时是不可能的。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Eva
Umineko Project (UP): "...Still Christmas, even after the sun rises...... Oh, I've got it."
Steam (ST): "...Still Christmas, even after the sun rises... Oh, I've got it."
PC Japanese (JP): 「夜が明けてもまだクリスマス……。あ、伯母さん、わーかった。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「夜が明けてもまだクリスマス……。あ、伯母さん、わーかった」
Russian (RU): "...По‐прежнему рождество даже после восхода солнца...... О, я поняла."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Ainda é Natal, mesmo depois do sol nascer...... Ah, eu entendi."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「再天亮還是聖誕節……。啊，姑母我知道了。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「再天亮还是圣诞节……。啊，姑母我知道了。」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Umineko Project (UP): "Huh? How?! How can the day after Christmas be Christmas again?!"
Steam (ST): "Huh? How?! How can the day after Christmas be Christmas again?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「え？　どうして？！　どうしてクリスマスの次の日がまたクリスマスなの？！」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「诶？为什么？！为什么圣诞节的第二天还是圣诞节呢？！」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Kinzo
Umineko Project (UP): "Wahhahahahaha. Think about it for yourself, Ange."
